item.title: Rachel add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!" -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "There's nothing I can't live with. Only things I won't live without." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Don't gobblefunk around with words." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
item.description: "Aw, did you just fall?" "No." I rolled onto my back, wincing. "I attacked the floor." -- Jennifer L. Armentrout

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
item.description: "Beautiful face. Beautiful body. Horrible attitude. It was the holy trinity of hot boys." -- Jennifer L. Armentrout

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
item.description: "You look like you got more of a bath than the car. I never thought washing a car would be so hard, but after watching you for the last fifteen minutes, I’m convinced it should be an Olympic sport." -- Jennifer L. Armentrout

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
Rachel add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Rachel add a quote by A. M. Hudson
item.description: "When love dies, the heart's ashes do not leave on the wind—they rest on the mantelpiece of the soul, darkening the sunrise we once saw to be beautiful." -- A. M. Hudson

item.title: Rachel add a quote by A.M. Hudson
item.description: "Books are the reality you get to choose; life is the reality you hide from inside a book." -- A.M. Hudson
